https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oX85kt2Wh3qQEDnvPgRJYAbCeQP.jpg After robbing a strip club, three desperate teenage girls lead a misogynistic Federal Agent on a lysergic cross-country chase, scoring a duffle bag full of money, drugs, and a crew of willing kidnapees along the way. Bad Girls
